Package frc.robot

Class VisionSystem

java.lang.Object
frc.robot.VisionSystem
public class VisionSystem extends Object
Gather results from the vision cameras, process, and call method to update odometry.
File: VisionSystem.java

Referenceable items: (classes)
VisionSystem

Depends on:
photonVision - uses PhotonVision library.
Operating system specifics:
None - transportable

Notes:

  • Method Details

    • init

      public static void init()
      Initialize the vision processing system. Create field layout. Define cameras. Create PhotonPoseEst objects. Create worker thread. Create NT system helper items.

    • getUpdateCount

      public static int getUpdateCount()
      Get update count
      Returns:
      updateCount - int - Update count

    • getTargetFound01

      public static boolean getTargetFound01()
      Did we find a target. Return TRUE if we have a target.
      Returns:
      targetFound - boolean - TRUE if a target was found the last execution cycle.
